name: getSubsetFromObject

type.rawType: <T, K extends (keyof T)[]>(object: T, keys: K) => Pick<T, Subset>

value:
<T, K extends readonly (keyof T)[]>(
  object: T,
  keys: K
) => {
  type Subset = typeof keys[number];

  const subsetObject = keys.reduce((obj, key) => {
    return { ...obj, [key]: object[key] };
  }, {} as Partial<T>) as Pick<T, Subset>;
  return subsetObject;
}
